page.title: 11Recreation.
page.content: These are popular games for children in the 1980's. "Forty,Forty," is a game for many people. One person is, "On," whilst the others go and hide. The person who is, "On," counts to 100 and when he's finished, he goes to,look for them. If he finds them, he runs back to his base and says ,"Forty,Forty,see you." If someone gets home, they say, "Forty,Forty,home." In the Circle game, you get into a circle and one person touches someone on the back. They have to come after you. You run around twice to get, "Home."
